fixed_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to 124.2/129.1/134.0% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 18% for foes with an elemental ailment.
fixed_skill.name: Freila

innate_skill.desc: Restores 5.0% of max HP and 6 SP when ambushing.
innate_skill.name: Heat Up II

innate_skill.desc: Decrease SP cost of skills by 3.6%.
innate_skill.name: Spell Master II

innate_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to all foes equal to 61.8/64.2/66.6% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 18% for foes with an elemental ailment.
innate_skill.name: Mafreila

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 11.6%. Decrease SP cost of Nuclear skills by 27%.
passive_skill.name: Essence of Strength

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 11.6%. Decrease SP cost of Nuclear skills by 31%.
passive_skill.name: Essence of Strength I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 11.6%. Decrease SP cost of Nuclear skills by 35%.
passive_skill.name: Essence of Strength II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
